about_the_game:
Chef's Adventure is a 2D jump and rum, with platforming elements which brings you into the cozy world filled with creatures.
Some are friendly, some are vile. Build to bring a smooth platforming experience and joy while playing.

Use your controller or mouse + keyboard for steering the small Chef.
Go on an adventure that will teach your Chef new tricks like double jump.

The story

It's nearly time for your best friend birthday! You gather the ingredients but realize that the eggs are missing.
You head to your local farmers market and they are all out of eggs.
"The chickens! They are gone! Can you fetch them back please?"
You set off into an adventure to gather the chickens - unknowing what kind of adventure awaits you.
Maybe you shouldn't go alone?
detailed_description:
The Demo

The Demo
While the full version of this game is currently under development, please checkout the Demo with three levels to explore the mechanics:
Find three chickens, gain a new skill every time you collect all three chickens.

The demo includes:

  • Three levels.
  • Four chickens.
  • Three type of frogs.

The demo does not include:

  • Egg
  • Cake


About the Game

Chef's Adventure is a 2D jump and rum, with platforming elements which brings you into the cozy world filled with creatures.
Some are friendly, some are vile. Build to bring a smooth platforming experience and joy while playing.

Use your controller or mouse + keyboard for steering the small Chef.
Go on an adventure that will teach your Chef new tricks like double jump.

The story

It's nearly time for your best friend birthday! You gather the ingredients but realize that the eggs are missing.
You head to your local farmers market and they are all out of eggs.
"The chickens! They are gone! Can you fetch them back please?"
You set off into an adventure to gather the chickens - unknowing what kind of adventure awaits you.
Maybe you shouldn't go alone?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS / Arch Linux
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support of OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS / Arch Linux
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support of OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Chef's Adventure is a 2D side-scrolling jump and run game about a small Chef searching for chickens which have escaped. Find the chickens and gain new skills. You will meet various enemies and challenges on this journey through 10 glorious levels (3 in demo), each with its own charm and character.
